Name: Greek Martini
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of mint leaf or sprig.
Garnish with mint leaf or sprig tip floated or pegged to rim.
Review: Mastiha (which after all is a botanically flavoured spirit) combines wonderfully with gin and dry vermouth. A splash of ouzo adds a touch more Greek personality.
History: Created by yours truly in August 2015.
Nutrition: One serving of Greek Martini contains 197 calories
